mapper.select: SELECT occurtime, customer , mailid, upoaid , status, upoaname FROM public.tbl_jikahoeventlist ORDER BY eventid DESC

SELECT tl.occurtime AS occurtime, tl.customer AS customer , tl.mailid AS mailid, tl.upoaid AS upoaid, tl.status AS status, tl.upoaname AS upoaname, te.eventname AS eventname, te.eventkind AS eventkind, tm.mailtext AS mailtext FROM tbl_jikahoeventid te, tbl_jikahoeventlist tl, tbl_jikahomaillist tm WHERE te.eventid = tl.eventid AND tl.mailid = tm.mailid
AND tl.occurtime BETWEEN to_timestamp(#{fromDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_timestamp(#{toDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY tl.occurtime DESC

SELECT elist.occurtime, elist.customer , eid.eventname, eid.eventkind , elist.status, elist.upoaname FROM public.tbl_jikahoeventlist elist FULL OUTER JOIN public.tbl_jikahoeventid eid ON elist.eventid = eid.eventid
